channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bulk Datetime Change
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bulk Datetime Change

item.title: CVE-2021-24842|2024-08-03T19:42:17.397Z -- unknown -- bulk%20datetime%20change
item.description: The Bulk Datetime Change WordPress plugin before 1.12 does not enforce capability checks which allows users with Contributor roles to 1) list private post titles of other users and 2) change the posted date of other users' posts.
